src:
KPK Panggil 2 Saksi Tersangka Darman Mappangara Terkait Suap Baggage Handling System
01 Nov 2019, 13:47 by Eko Sulestyono


KPK Panggil 2 Saksi Tersangka Darman Mappangara Terkait Suap Baggage Handling System

KBRN, Jakarta : Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) hari ini dijadwalkan memanggil sekaligus memeriksa dua orang saksi dalam kasus dugaan perkara Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) proyek pembangunan sistem penanganan bagasi atau Baggage Handling System BHS).
Rencana proyek itu nantinya akan diperuntukkan PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP). Sedangkan pelaksana proyek itu dipercayakan kepada PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) dengan menggunakan anggaran Tahun 2019.l
Kabiro Humas KPK, Febri Diansyah memjelasakan bahwa kedua saksi tersebut dijadwalkan akan diperiksa untuk tersangka Darman Mappangara, mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT INTI. 
"KPK dijadwalkan memeriksa 2 orang saksi untuk tersangka DMP (Darma Mappangara) terkait tindak pidana korupsi suap pekerjaan Baggage Handling System (BHS) pada PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) yang dilaksanakan oleh PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) Tahun 2019," kata Febri Diansyah, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Febri menjelaskan bahwa kedua saksi yang dipanggil penyidik itu masing-masing Direktur Utama (DIirut) PT. SOG Indonesia Sanny Jauwhannen dan Direktur Utama PT Excellindo Chandra Mulia Hendi Chandra.
KPK sebelumnya telah menetapkan dua orang tersangka, mantan Direktur Keuangan PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam (AYA) dan Taswin Nur (TSW) dari pihak swasta atau teman dekat dari Darman Mappangara.
Selanjutnya, dalam pengembangan kasus itu, KPK menetapkan Darman sebagai tersangka baru.  Sementara itu tersangka Taswin saat sedang menjalani proses  persidangan di Gesung Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta. Taswin didakwa menjadi perantara suap kepada Andra sebesar 71 ribu dolar AS dan 96.700 Dolar Singapura (SGD). 
Tujuan pemberian uang tersebut diduga agat PT INTI menjadi pelaksana pekerjaan dalam pengadaan dan pemasangan Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) di Kantor Cabang PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II antara PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) dan PT INTI.
text:
KPK Summon 2 Witnesses, Darman Mappangara Regarding Baggage Handling System Bribery
01 Nov 2019, 13:47 by Eko Sulestyono


KPK Summon 2 Witnesses, Darman Mappangara Regarding Baggage Handling System Bribery

KBRN, Jakarta: The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) today is scheduled to summon as well as examine two witnesses in a case of alleged corruption in the project of developing a baggage handling system or the Baggage Handling System BHS).
The project plan will be intended for PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP). While the project implementer was entrusted to PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) using the 2019 budget
KPK Head of Public Relations, Febri Diansyah explained that the two witnesses were scheduled to be examined for the suspect Darman Mappangara, former President Director of PT INTI.
"The KPK is scheduled to examine two witnesses for the suspect DMP (Darma Mappangara) related to the corruption of the bribery corruption of the Baggage Handling System (BHS) work at PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) carried out by PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) in 2019," said Febri Diansyah, Friday (11/01/2019).
Febri explained that the two witnesses summoned by the investigators were the Managing Director of PT. SOG Indonesia Sanny Jauwhannen and President Director of PT Excellindo Chandra Mulia Hendi Chandra.
The KPK had previously named two suspects, former Finance Director of PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam (AYA) and Taswin Nur (TSW) from the private sector or a close friend of Darman Mappangara.
Furthermore, in developing the case, the KPK named Darman a new suspect. Meanwhile, the suspect Taswin was currently undergoing a trial process at the Jakarta Corruption Court Corruption Court. Taswin was charged with being a bribe broker to Andra in the amount of 71 thousand US dollars and 96,700 Singapore Dollars (SGD).
The purpose of giving the money is allegedly for PT INTI to be the executor of the work in the procurement and installation of the Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) at the PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II Branch Office between PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) and PT INTI.
